name: High Stakes (beta)
description:
The game is a rougelite game, where you choose cards which sends you to the next area. It is a work in progress, and the current build is for playtesting. Apologies if the games screen size is too big.

Fight through rooms to try to beat the boss of the gauntlet, while finding unique weapons and enemies throughout.

Any feedback is welcomed

https://forms.office.com/e/G3n6gbDPW7

-----------------------------

Visit my Youtube if you want really bad updates: (12) High Stakes - YouTube
